text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Lotta ta ta… Lovin! Lovin! Lotta ta ta… Ahh!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Dangit, I still can't do it! I just can't get into the rhythm.
Tokai Teio was dancing in the nearby park.
choice_data_list: Are you training for your winning live?
Are you training for your winning live?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Oh, hey Trainer. No, this isn't for that.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: I just love dancing games is all, so I'm training for that!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Racing's all about who's fastest, right? Well dancing games are kinda different.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: While winning a race is important, looking the part is just as important! You've gotta look cool, cute, dazzling, and beautiful!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: It's amazing, isn't it? It's so much fun and the perfect hobby for someone as amazing and great as me! Nothing else can compare!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Or at least that's what I thought… haa…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Yeah, someone managed to beat my highscore the other day.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: My high score was 620,000 points, but they managed to get 999,999 points! They absolutely blew my score away…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: It made me so frustrated. I know I'm capable of more! That's why I've been practicing.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: But I've done everything I can think of! Trainer, could you come with me to the arcade?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: It's time for the real battle! I can do this, I know it! Here I go!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Whoo, it's a new personal best! But I'm nowhere near the high score. Traaiiner…
choice_data_list: You can do this, I know it!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Th-Thank you… You're right, giving up after one try isn't like me.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: I'm the unbeatable Teio! I just need to be more bouncy and light! Alright, it's time for round two!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Another personal best! But I still didn't make it! Nngh, now what do I do…?

text_block_list.name: Girl
text_block_list.text: You can do it Miss!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Wait, who're you?

text_block_list.name: Girl
text_block_list.text: She's been watching you the entire time cheering you on.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: R-Really? Hey, so do you like watching dancing?

text_block_list.name: Girl
text_block_list.text: Yup, I like it a lot! But…

text_block_list.name: Girl
text_block_list.text: When you make a face like you're upset it makes me sad too…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Like I'm upset? Ah, when I get into a tight spot I probably make that face…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Dance games are all about having fun. So if I'm upset while I'm playing it, I'll never be able to take the high score back.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: I can't change the things that make me frustrated, but smiling through them is important! If I can do that then I think I'll be able to move smoother! Isn't that right, Trainer?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Okay, I'll keep trying! And no matter how many times it takes, I'll continue to smile through it until I finally pass the goal!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Alright, let's try again! Everyone, thanks for cheering me on!
And with everyone in the arcades' eyes glued to her, Tokai Teio began her quest!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Haa… I stopped smiling for a second there… But I've still got so much left to do!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: I finally passed the 900,000 threshold! I really can do this!

text_block_list.name: Arcade-goers
text_block_list.text: Teio! Teio!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Thanks everyone. But I think I'm almost at my limit… My body's going to give up on me soon… but still…

text_block_list.name: Arcade-goers
text_block_list.text: Teio! Teio!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Hearing everyone cheer me on gives me strength! I just need to concentrate. This'll be my last chance.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Huh, the sound stopped. Did I… make it…?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Yaay! I hit the max points!! Trainer, Everyone, I did it!!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Thanks! I almost gave up halfway through, but I'm so glad I didn't…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Everyone here gave me the strength to move forward. Thanks to everyone, the unbeatable Teio became something even more than that!
choice_data_list: It's almost like a team victory, huh?
It's almost like a team victory, huh?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Yup, and not only did I manage to get the highscore, I had fun while I was doing it! That's why everyone felt so passionate.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, the score may be the same, but at least I beat my rival in artistic points!

text_block_list.name: Arcade Staff
text_block_list.text: Huh…? Wait, isn't that that one machine…?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Huh…? Is something the matter?

text_block_list.name: Arcade Staff
text_block_list.text: I'm really sorry about this, but I forgot to reset the scores after I took it in for maintenance the other day.

text_block_list.name: Arcade Staff
text_block_list.text: The top score stayed maxed out from the maintenance check, but I'll reset it now.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Huuuh, so you're telling me that that high score wasn't because of my rival, but was because of the maintenance?!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, that's actually so funny! I got so worked up over a rival that doesn't actually exist!
choice_data_list: Are you upset about how it ended?
Are you upset about how it ended?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: A little, but it's okay. Thanks to that mistake I learned something important today.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: I learned the power of encouragement. Somehow, my fan's encouragement made the unbeatable Teio much much stronger!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Today was just practice, but next time we'll show our stuff on the real track! And I'll meet everyone's cheers with a dramatic victory!
